field: Aveo Healthcare Limited, trading as Aveo, oversees five Brisbane retirement villages in south-east Queensland, located in Albany Creek, Clayfield, Cleveland, Durack and Taringa. Aveo Healthcare was previously listed on the Australian Securities Exchange until it delisted in April 2014. Today, it is 85.6% owned by AVEO GROUP LIMITED (formerly FKP Property Group), a developer, operator and manager of retirement villages and aged care facilities across Australia (ASX
value: AOG). The group is based in Sydney, New South Wales.
